message.content:
cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC. 

The paper focuses on the development of an interactive energy management system that utilizes data collected from households to provide personalized feedback on energy usage. This involves the use of hardware measurement units and a management software, as well as the formulation of energy efficiency policies for residential buildings. The paper also discusses the use of widgets to display consumption information and provide tailored advice. Given these topics, the most likely sub-category is cs.SY (Systems and Control), which deals with the design and analysis of complex systems. Other likely sub-categories include cs.CY (Computers and Society), which deals with the social and ethical implications of computing, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), which deals with the development of intelligent systems, cs.LG (Machine Learning), which deals with the development of algorithms that can learn from data, and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction), which deals with the design and evaluation of interactive systems.
